title: Derrick Rose to return on Wednesday for Bulls
text:
It’s looks as though the timetable is on schedule for Bulls point guard Derrick Rose to return after surgery on his left orbital bone.
Fred Hoiberg and the coaching staff visited with Rose on Friday to offer support and go over the new offense. Hoiberg said Rose is set to return to the team on Wednesday morning.
From the Chicago Sun-Times : “[The Friday] follow-up went very well,’’ Hoiberg said. “They’ve advised him to continue to let that sight heal, and they think the best way for him to do that is to stay at home at this time. We plan on him being back on Wednesday morning.’’
Hoiberg went on to say: “It doesn’t change the [two-week timetable for Rose’s return]. Everything is the same on that. And then after those two weeks he should be able to resume full activity.”
Rose turned 27 on Sunday.
Happy Birthday @drose ! pic.twitter.com/ENRv46JLtW
— Chicago Bulls (@chicagobulls) October 4, 2015
